text: Skien is a city and a municipality in Telemark, Norway. Skien is the capital of Telemark county. Skien has a population of 55 079. == Geography == Skien is located in the South-East of Telemark. The closest city to Skien is Porsgrunn. Together Skien and Porsgrunn is the seventh largest urban area in Norway. Skienselva is a river flowing through the city, dividing Skien in half. Animal life: The Aglia tau (picture), a moth that is known as the tau emperor, has been found (as late as the 2020s).https://www.nrk.no/vestfoldogtelemark/xl/mariken-fra-skien-jakter-pa- den-sjeldne-sommerfuglen-naglespinner-med-en-lysfelle-1.16944923. title: Skien
